/*eslint-disable*/
'use strict';

var results = { repos:

       languages_url: 'https://api.github.com/repos/jaxnode/gulptest/languages',
       stargazers_url: 'https://api.github.com/repos/jaxnode/gulptest/stargazers',
       contributors_url: 'https://api.github.com/repos/jaxnode/gulptest/contributors',
       subscribers_url: 'https://api.github.com/repos/jaxnode/gulptest/subscribers',
       subscription_url: 'https://api.github.com/repos/jaxnode/gulptest/subscription',
       commits_url: 'https://api.github.com/repos/jaxnode/gulptest/commits{/sha}',
       git_commits_url: 'https://api.github.com/repos/jaxnode/gulptest/git/commits{/sha}',

       contents_url: 'https://api.github.com/repos/jaxnode/gulptest/contents/{+path}',
       compare_url: 'https://api.github.com/repos/jaxnode/gulptest/compare/{base}...{head}',
       merges_url: 'https://api.github.com/repos/jaxnode/gulptest/merges',
       archive_url: 'https://api.github.com/repos/jaxnode/gulptest/{archive_format}{/ref}',
       downloads_url: 'https://api.github.com/repos/jaxnode/gulptest/downloads',
       issues_url: 'https://api.github.com/repos/jaxnode/gulptest/issues{/number}',
       pulls_url: 'https://api.github.com/repos/jaxnode/gulptest/pulls{/number}',
       milestones_url: 'https://api.github.com/repos/jaxnode/gulptest/milestones{/number}',
       notifications_url: 'https://api.github.com/repos/jaxnode/gulptest/notifications{?since,all,participating}',
       labels_url: 'https://api.github.com/repos/jaxnode/gulptest/labels{/name}',
       releases_url: 'https://api.github.com/repos/jaxnode/gulptest/releases{/id}',
       created_at: '2015-03-18T17:56:15Z',
       updated_at: '2015-03-20T01:41:07Z',
       pushed_at: '2015-03-20T01:41:07Z',
       git_url: 'git://github.com/jaxnode/gulptest.git',
       ssh_url: 'git@github.com:jaxnode/gulptest.git',
       clone_url: 'https://github.com/jaxnode/gulptest.git',
       svn_url: 'https://github.com/jaxnode/gulptest',
       homepage: '',
       size: 84,
       stargazers_count: 0,
       watchers_count: 0,
       language: 'JavaScript',
       has_issues: false,
       has_downloads: true,
       has_wiki: true,
       has_pages: false,
       forks_count: 0,
       mirror_url: null,
       open_issues_count: 0,
       forks: 0,
       open_issues: 0,
       watchers: 0,
       default_branch: 'master' } ] };
       
function getCode(cb) {
    cb(true, results);
};

module.exports = getCode;

source_files.name: fakes/meetuperrorfake.js
source_files.source:
/*eslint-disable*/ 'use strict'; function getNextMeetup(cb) { var err = true; var results = { utc_offset: -18000000, venue: { country: 'us', city: 'Jacksonville', address_1: '10752 Deerwood Park Blvd Suite 110,', name: 'Availity', lon: -81.531815, id: 19194672, state: 'FL', lat: 30.246962, repinned: false }, headcount: 0, visibility: 'public', waitlist_count: 0, created: 1449602582000, maybe_rsvp_count: 0, description: '

React.js is popular JavaScript framework that has really caught fire in the last year. Most developers believe that React.js is a competitor to frameworks like Ember.js, Aurelia and Angular.js.

The truth is that you can use React.js with frameworks such as Ember.js and Angular 2. With Angular 2\'s new module system you can use React.js with Angular.

We are happy to Michael Snead back to present on this topic. Hope to see you there at the next JaxNode meetup.

', event_url: 'http://www.meetup.com/Jax-Node-js-UG/events/227297428/', yes_rsvp_count: 2, name: 'Using React with Angular.js', id: '227297428', time: 'Jan 21, 2016 6:30 PM', updated: 1449681014000, group: { join_mode: 'open', created: 1379101145000, name: 'Jax Node.js UG', group_lon: -81.51000213623047, id: 10250862, urlname: 'Jax-Node-js-UG', group_lat: 30.309999465942383, who: 'Noders' }, status: 'upcoming' }; cb(err, results); }; module.exports = getNextMeetup;

source_files.name: fakes/meetupfake.js
source_files.source:
/*eslint-disable*/ 'use strict'; function getNextMeetup(cb) { var err = false; var results = { utc_offset: -18000000, venue: { country: 'us', city: 'Jacksonville', address_1: '10752 Deerwood Park Blvd Suite 110,', name: 'Availity', lon: -81.531815, id: 19194672, state: 'FL', lat: 30.246962, repinned: false }, headcount: 0, visibility: 'public', waitlist_count: 0, created: 1449602582000, maybe_rsvp_count: 0, description: '

React.js is popular JavaScript framework that has really caught fire in the last year. Most developers believe that React.js is a competitor to frameworks like Ember.js, Aurelia and Angular.js.

The truth is that you can use React.js with frameworks such as Ember.js and Angular 2. With Angular 2\'s new module system you can use React.js with Angular.

We are happy to Michael Snead back to present on this topic. Hope to see you there at the next JaxNode meetup.

', event_url: 'http://www.meetup.com/Jax-Node-js-UG/events/227297428/', yes_rsvp_count: 2, name: 'Using React with Angular.js', id: '227297428', time: 'Jan 21, 2016 6:30 PM', updated: 1449681014000, group: { join_mode: 'open', created: 1379101145000, name: 'Jax Node.js UG', group_lon: -81.51000213623047, id: 10250862, urlname: 'Jax-Node-js-UG', group_lat: 30.309999465942383, who: 'Noders' }, status: 'upcoming' }; cb(err, results); }; module.exports = getNextMeetup;

source_files.source: /*eslint-disable*/ 'use strict'; function getFeed(cb) { var error = true; var results = { tweets: [ { text: 'Node.js Foundation: Our security process is \'top notch\' https://t.co/adlVIso1vq via @infoworld', icon: 'http://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/378800000793404283/ec790ccec0875f4a8283fe7eb00b0776_normal.png', name: 'jaxnode' }, { text: 'RT @TheNextWeb: Facebook lets anyone build a social network with its AI hardware https://t.co/WcCUafX8aS https://t.co/ijPRXNCswZ', icon: 'http://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/378800000793404283/ec790ccec0875f4a8283fe7eb00b0776_normal.png', name: 'jaxnode' }, { text: 'RT @jsconf: The final #jsconf us family photo — #lastcall https://t.co/gMTQ9zVmLM', icon: 'http://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/378800000793404283/ec790ccec0875f4a8283fe7eb00b0776_normal.png', name: 'jaxnode' }, { text: 'RT @nodenpm: check-ticker-symbol (1.0.0): https://t.co/8kLutPV7iZ A simple Node.js module that checks whether a ticker (stock) s...', icon: 'http://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/378800000793404283/ec790ccec0875f4a8283fe7eb00b0776_normal.png', name: 'jaxnode' }, { text: 'RT @jdalton: lodash now has more stars on @github than coffeescript ☕\nI have no idea what that means.', icon: 'http://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/378800000793404283/ec790ccec0875f4a8283fe7eb00b0776_normal.png', name: 'jaxnode' }, { text: 'The Netflix Tech Blog: Debugging Node.js in Production https://t.co/6rxCN9cPsl', icon: 'http://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/378800000793404283/ec790ccec0875f4a8283fe7eb00b0776_normal.png', name: 'jaxnode' }, { text: 'Publish, please! CLI tool and Gulp plugin that allows you publish npm modules safely and gracefully. https://t.co/zBhh3hfkMY', icon: 'http://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/378800000793404283/ec790ccec0875f4a8283fe7eb00b0776_normal.png', name: 'jaxnode' }, { text: 'Debug HTTP/HTTPS requests in Node.js https://t.co/JmFu79VUby', icon: 'http://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/378800000793404283/ec790ccec0875f4a8283fe7eb00b0776_normal.png', name: 'jaxnode' }, { text: 'A Reunited Node.js Guns for the Enterprise https://t.co/YXdfdWHsf6', icon: 'http://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/378800000793404283/ec790ccec0875f4a8283fe7eb00b0776_normal.png', name: 'jaxnode' }, { text: 'The Obligatory "Flame War" Phoenix vs Node.js https://t.co/dNhIgeXH4A', icon: 'http://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/378800000793404283/ec790ccec0875f4a8283fe7eb00b0776_normal.png', name: 'jaxnode' }, { text: 'How Node.js Powers the Many User Interfaces of Netflix https://t.co/VwLTs0Uljd', icon: 'http://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/378800000793404283/ec790ccec0875f4a8283fe7eb00b0776_normal.png', name: 'jaxnode' }, { text: 'Building Secure APIs with Express.js https://t.co/hqVpM72rsG', icon: 'http://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/378800000793404283/ec790ccec0875f4a8283fe7eb00b0776_normal.png', name: 'jaxnode' }, { text: 'Convert Image to ASCII Art with Node.js by @davidwalshblog https://t.co/H3C897ugLk', icon: 'http://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/378800000793404283/ec790ccec0875f4a8283fe7eb00b0776_normal.png', name: 'jaxnode' }, { text: 'An Introduction to IoT with Arduino, Node and a Plant https://t.co/iiFVZus0os', icon: 'http://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/378800000793404283/ec790ccec0875f4a8283fe7eb00b0776_normal.png', name: 'jaxnode' }, { text: 'Postgres and Node - Hands on using Postgres as a Document Store with MassiveJS Craig Kerstiens: https://t.co/bzwceWq1X8', icon: 'http://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/378800000793404283/ec790ccec0875f4a8283fe7eb00b0776_normal.png', name: 'jaxnode' }, { text: 'Apigee, RisingStack and Yahoo Join the Node.js Foundation https://t.co/xTmno7GyVa', icon: 'http://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/378800000793404283/ec790ccec0875f4a8283fe7eb00b0776_normal.png', name: 'jaxnode' }, { text: 'Microservices in Seconds: Node.js + Docker + NoSQL https://t.co/ITKDHmcQea', icon: 'http://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/378800000793404283/ec790ccec0875f4a8283fe7eb00b0776_normal.png', name: 'jaxnode' }, { text: 'WHATWG HTML5 specification-compliant, fast and ready for production HTML parsing/serialization toolset for Node.js https://t.co/2tPXiE2kXB', icon: 'http://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/378800000793404283/ec790ccec0875f4a8283fe7eb00b0776_normal.png', name: 'jaxnode' }, { text: 'Node.js Foundation Advances Platform with More Than Three Million Users https://t.co/MIYaPUST6s', icon: 'http://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/378800000793404283/ec790ccec0875f4a8283fe7eb00b0776_normal.png', name: 'jaxnode' }, { text: 'Hunting a Ghost - Finding a Memory Leak in Node.js https://t.co/0C5Rlou0CN via @RisingStack', icon: 'http://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/378800000793404283/ec790ccec0875f4a8283fe7eb00b0776_normal.png', name: 'jaxnode' } ] }; cb(error, results); }; module.exports = getFeed;
